report.title: eBMS App Timed Count GIS Details 2
report.description: eBMS specific: sample details for use with GIS orientated downloads with boundary filter for download integration.
report.query: SELECT #columns# from cache_samples_functional s join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.sample_id = s.id join cache_samples_nonfunctional csn on csn.id = s.id #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND s.survey_id = #survey_id# AND (GeometryType(s.public_geom) = 'LINESTRING' OR GeometryType(s.public_geom) = 'MULTILINESTRING')

param.name: indexed_location_list_context
param.join: JOIN locations lcontext on st_intersects(lcontext.boundary_geom, s.public_geom) AND lcontext.id IN (#indexed_location_list_context#)
